title: Looking for people to play with
body:
Hey
I'm 69er, I finished last season plat 5 (gold 1 rewards). I'm basically just looking for people of whatever rank (or unranked idc) to play with and skype at the same time. A group to join would be cool, or other stragglers like myself.

Add me in-game if you're interested!

replies.body: Yo you legit sound like me! I moved to australia and because of that no longer have old friends to play with...finding new people would rock, so I'll hit you up in game later
